title: What is your opinion on Justin Bieber? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a few years from now he will be forgotten. He has no talent, no dancing skill, no songwriter ability, cannot sing. He is a manufactured “ star” with no charisma. He is not eloquent or intelligent. His success has gone to his head. He is extremely overrated. He only appeals to 12 and 14 years old. He is not even worthy to talk about. There are dozens of other singers who are by far more talented than him and are not given half the promotion or attention he is. His music has no cultural significance. It is not groundbreaking or gamechanging. He is not a baritone, not even a tenor, he has no chest voice, no falsetto, no vocal range whatsoever. His songs are catchy yet corny. They will not stand the test of time. He has absolutely nothing to contribute to either music or dance. He is the epitome of how limited real talent is in music industry nowadays. His commercial success is a result of promotion not of actual talent. He is incredibly lucky to have had this success and thus this net worth. I would not attend his concerts even if i was paid. He cannot sing to save his life. He is the reason legends like Elvis, Prince and Michael Jackson will never be forgotten and will always be legends. He does not have a fracture of their genius, talent, charisma, stage presence. He does not have a fracture of Justin Timberlake’s and Bruno Mars’ talent, let alone Michael Jackson and Prince.

Justin Bieber is a Superstar. Rather you like him or you don't the youngster that started out and came to the United States is one of the biggest Pop stars in the Business. His voice is so beautiful, and he sings with such passion and heart.He has broke 17 Guinness World Records.3.He is compassionate,giving,loving,and cares deeply for othersHe was honored for being the artist who has Granted the most wishes with the Make a wish foundation.He donates to many charities ,he visits hospitals and spends time with the sick children to help brighten there day.He helps build schools physically and with money donations.I love the messages he leaves the world, To spread love not hate,to Believe,to have Purpose in Live. He has saved so many lives.He is a beautiful Human being with a very sensitive heart and I can proudly say I am a big fan.He is talented. He sings , he can dance, he can act. And for being 24 has achieved more already then most do in there entire life.

My opinion of Justin Bieber always seems to be changing. When he was just starting out I could not have cared less. He was just an obnoxious little boy making music for little girls, and I was way way out of that demo. As he started to get a little older, his music started to get a little better but his behavior went off the rails. It wasn't annoying pop tunes anymore. It was a kid who seemed like a danger to himself and those around him. But now... well. This article nicely sums up a lot of my feelings. The music isn't perfect -- it's still maturing -- but it's actually good now. And then on top of that, he's totally reformed his image and seems to be growing up. So... I mean... I guess I like him. Purpose is good, and he doesn't seem to be that dumbass kid anymore. Good for him.

I've never been a "belieber" nor have I ever hated him like many people do. Though sometimes he has acted kinda like a dick, but then nobody's perfect. When it comes to his music, yup it is quiet dancy and catchy.  I honestly believe that he is a really brave guy. I say so because despite the huge amount of hate from the masses he persevered. I can't even imagine dealing with so much hate. I mean if some one comments on my answer to merely ask something regarding the topic/issue I wrote about, I go like, "omg how am I supposed to reply?" And "was he being sarcastic?" Or "is she making fun of me?".  Maybe it's just my thing. You know.  So yeah, that's my opinion about Justin Bieber.

A boy who became a superstar at a very young age by giving one of the most viewed song on youtube “Baby”.  He is the only young artist who has most number of single hits. In 2015, he was trolled by the whole world beacuse of his mischieves. But 1 year later he showed his love to the people by giving another blockbuster “sorry”. The most viewed video of 2016. But still his haters didn’t stopped trolling him. Most of the boys out there hates him beacuse they are jealous, as he became very succesful at a young age. They always trolls him by saying “gay” and many other disgusting words. Although, girls like him because of his good looks. I think people should accept his success and stop making his fun. I believe his biggest hater in the world also listens to his songs, so, stop swagging in front of your friends by insulting him and respect his work. Edit:- I have also made fun of him many times but the views are now changing.

I don't really know what to write about Justin. All I can say is that he is an amazing human being who tries to get better every day. I DON'T know how he deals with the hate. But I just wanna say that there are people who love you for who you are. Haters used to say that his fans love him for his appearance, good looks and hair. Hey haters, just look at him now. He DOESN'T care about these things now. He wears anything, he didn't even get a haircut for a long time, he grew his moustache. But still beliebers love him from the core of their heart. I am ready to fight the whole world for him though I have been bullied for being a belieber. But I just want him to know that he is doing so great. He inspires me in my everyday struggle. Thank you so so much, Justin. You will always be my favourite boy in the whole universe. You are so talented, kind and giving. You have the voice of an angel. Te amo, TESORO. To all the haters, please stay away…..

He Has More Twitter Followers Than The Population Of Canada The singer, who was born in the heart of Ontario in Canada, currently has approx. 92 millionfollowers on the social media website while the entire population of Canada is an estimated 36 million. The difference is astounding!2. He’s On Text With His Pastor Daily  We know the singer is religious and because of a few troubles in his past, he texts Pastor Judah Smith of Seattle’s nondenominational City Church on a daily basis. Pastor Smith works with the singer to “not get discouraged or despondent because of perceived failures.” On a few occasions he has also accompanied the singer to South Africa as well as Australia. 3. Four Of His Music Videos Are On Youtube’s Most Watched List! The official music videos for “Love Yourself”, “What Do You Mean”, “Baby” and “Sorry”are on the list, making him the only male musician to exceed one million views on his channel. Talk about the number of people watching those videos! 4. He Has A Few Wax Statue Versions All Over The World.  Madame Tussauds, the world’s most famous wax sculpture museum, have five versions of Bieber’s wax statue at their various stores all over the world! His statues also have the most number of pictures taken with the visitors. Source:- Justin Bieber Height, Weight, Age, Affairs, Family, Biography, Facts & More and Justin Bieber

I struggle to have an opinion of him. Like so many pop stars across the years, he is the aural equivalent of beige, the music is designed to appeal to the widest common denominator with no regard for quality, feel or self worth, it's made to make bucks. When was accepting mediocrity in exchange for wealth and status ever a good thing?As for his personal life, that's his lookout. It seems he's a bit of an indulged prat, but that's hardly surprising. To quote the late Bill Hicks' impassioned plea to musicians, "play from your f***king heart!"

Best singer in the world. He has great fan following. And some magazines called him the biggest pop star after   The Great Michael Jackson. I can't compare him with M.J. but he is really good singer.His new album purpose is awesome and the songs "sorry" and "love yourself" are on top of the billboard charts. And finally, he is the Grammy Winner.

Why some people like Justin -  1) cute 2) good music( well at least his recent one "purpose" 3) popular( believe it or not some people like celebrities because of their popularity(obviously)) etc random reasons  why people dislike Justin or want to kill him 1) Cute 2) popular( some people want what they cannot have) 3) canadian (HIMYM joke xD) 4) He acts like a D*** some times A person's opinion on justin depends on what type they are.

He's definitely very talented, his voice is marvellous and he can play the guitar, the piano and drums as well. He's a good person, he loves his fans and does charity . He's struggled a lot, what with all the completion and haters . He's made his share of mistakes, but he has been punished enough and he's trying to improve . He's a decent actor and a dancer as well, so yeah, I'd say that he's an amazing human being ❤

Well all the songs of Justin Bieber are good but their song Sorry is the best song. Ooh, ooh Ooh, ooh You gotta go and get angry at all of my honesty You know I try but I do not do too well with apologies I hope I did not run out of time, could someone call a referee? ‘Cause I just need one more shot at forgiveness  I know you know that I made those mistakes maybe once or twice By once or twice I mean maybe a couple of hundred times So let me, oh let me redeem, oh redeem, oh myself tonight ‘Cause I just need one more shot at second chances Yeah, is it too late now to say sorry? ‘Cause I’m missing more than just your body read more here justin bieber sorry

As a singer I like him a lot, every time i listen to his music Love Yourself, Sorry and 2U It gives me goosebumps. Try it out he is not at all bad as a singer. He has melodious voice no one can deny it. Respect him for what he is today.  PC:GOOGLE MKT

He's an extremely talented songwriter, singer who plays the drums and can play guitar. His lyrics reflect his life, loves and feelings. Personally, I wasn't into his earlier music simply because it was geared for younger people. PURPOSE was the first music of his I thought relatable. PURPOSE is well written and beautifully done. I've become a big fan since then. By the way, I'm 67. No BELIEBER. Just a diehard music fan of worthy music.
Justin has some of the best songs. He is also a hero for this little girl down below if your read the picture, and have a good heart i guarantee   you will gain respect for him!

I think he has a lot of growing up to do. Like many young artist, he took the wrong route while trying to make a name for himself. He is a very talented young man, but if he continues to follow in the footsteps of the people by whom he was influenced, musically, he is going to ruin his career. Thank God, Selena [Gomez] broke up with him because he was just going to ruin her career as well. People forget that everything we do, good or bad, has an effect on the those around us.

Well MY personal opinion on Justin Bieber is that he is a good musician. I love his new album - PURPOSE and I personally think his just really cute , he inspires the youth of today a lot in negative and positive ways but he has gotten mature over the years!!

Why is he a bit Girlish???????? I mean he sings so well. Then you see him , Miley Cyrus, Emma Watson sporting the same hairdo. Wish that guy would look more manly . I love his voice quality irrespective of whether he is singing solo or with a fab vocalist line Nikki Minaj. Well he makes me wonder what went wrong with a guy when he sounds so melodious and catchy?????? Can't figure why fans tear their clothes for him!!

I’m a big fan, and I was from 2010 till the start of 2013, and bounced back in mid 2014 onwards. I loved him because, like me, he was kinda feminine, and I liked his music. I didn’t like him when he got nasty, and big headed with concerts, and doing illegal stuff, but when he saw the error of his ways, my respect grew again.

Justin bieber , in my opinion is a very talented and successful artist. He achieved his dreams at a very young age. He has recieved a lot of hate too, but he somehow overcame it . I think he's  amazing. And no I'm not a belieber, I just like his songs :)
He is a legend . He is the artist who respect all others artist .. he is very handsome .. and his songs are very cool and stays always top.. he is best ..
